description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. create a vm
2. create a file in home directory
3. Take a snapshot of the vm
4. Launch snapshot image

expected result
new vm should have the file created in step 2

actual result
does not have the file in home directory
title: vmware: snapshot of a vm does not save the state of the vm
